title: Finding Mr. Right
description: Finding Mr. Right is a heartwarming tale for romantics and animal lovers. Amy Cameron has had a run of incredibly bad luck. Her husband and best friend are murdered, together, because they were having an affair--then her house burns to the ground! The last thing Amy needs is another man. But her deceased, traitorous, gal-pal is sent back to Earth to make up for her indiscretion and find Mr. Right for Amy. The only catch--she comes back as a ratty, little Welsh Corgi named Miss Piggy. Full of wit and charm, this delightful story will have you believing in angels and giving your dog an extra pat on the head. Barbara Rosenblat’s lively narration blends beautifully with Carmichael’s whimsical yarn.Length 10:42:00
author: Emily Carmichael
